Air Guard: This item stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.
Anthem: When wielded by a character with Bard levels, this item begins to hum an inspiring tune. Your bard songs regenerate slowly over time.
Anthem Melody - La Victoria!: Sing the anthem of your heart! Your Inspire Courage grants you and your allies additional attack, damage, saves versus Fear, and +3 additional Universal Spell Power.
Anthem Melody - Bulwark: While your Anthem is 3 or above, your Inspire Greatness grants you and your allies an additional +3 PRR
Armor Bonus +8: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +8 armor bonus to AC, just as though you were wearing armor.
Quality Armor Bonus +4: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +4 armor bonus to AC, just as though you were wearing armor.
Armor Mastery +1: Passive: +1 Enhancement bonus to the Max Dex Bonus of your equipped light, medium or heavy armor. This benefit does not apply to the Max Dex Bonus of a Tower Shield
Armor-Piercing +32%: +32% Enhancement bonus to bypass enemy fortification.
Insightful Armor-Piercing +13%: +13% Insight bonus to bypass enemy fortification.
Assassinate +6: +6 Enhancement bonus to the DC of Assassinate attempts.
Insightful Assassinate +4: +4 Insight bonus to the DC of Assassinate attempts.
Quality Assassinate +2: +2 Quality bonus to the DC of Assassinate attempts.
Attack Bonus +4: Provides a +4 competence bonus to your attack rolls.
Battle Arcanist: This is one of the three parts of the Battle Arcanist set. When all three items are equipped, you gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.
Blurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Enemies have a 20% chance to miss due to concealment.
Combat Mastery +1: +1 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
Insightful Combat Mastery +7: +7 Insight bonus to the DC to resist Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
Quality Combat Mastery +4: +4 Quality bonus to the DC to resist Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
Deadly +16: +16 Competence bonus to weapon damage.
Quality Deadly +4: +4 Quality bonus to weapon damage.
Insightful Deadly +8: +8 Insight bonus to weapon damage.
Deathblock VII: Passive: +21% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
Deathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
Deception +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to hit and +16 Damage for Sneak Attacks.
Insightful Deception +8: +8 Insight bonus to hit and +13 Damage for Sneak Attacks.
Quality Deception +3: +3 Quality bonus to hit and +5 Damage for Sneak Attacks.

Deception: This weapon is hard to focus upon and thus provides a +3 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, Deception weapons have a small chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
Demonic Curse: Each time you are hit in melee combat this is a chance that your attacker will be cursed.
Demonic Might: This item gives the wearer the power of a demon, granting a +2 Profane bonus to Strength.
Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you 30 temporary hit points.
Improved Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you 120 profane bonus to temporary hit points.
Demonic Retribution: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a demonic force will strike back at your attacker hitting them with an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell.
Disintegration Guard: This item has a store of dark insidious power deep within. When hit in melee, this power occasionally lashes out violently at enemies an attempts to disintegrate them.
Distant Diversion +15%: +15% Enhancement bonus to Decreased threat generated from ranged damage.
Insightful Distant Diversion +13: +13 Insight bonus to Decreased threat generated from ranged damage.
Diversion +33%: +33% Enhancement bonus to Decreased threat generated from melee damage.
Insightful Diversion +10%: +10% Insightful bonus to Decreased threat generated from melee damage.
Dodge Bonus +20%: +20% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
Insightful Dodge +4%: +4% Insight bonus to Dodge.
Quality Dodge +5%: +5% Quality bonus to Dodge.
Doubleshot +12%: +12% Enhancement bonus to Doubleshot chance.
Insightful Doubleshot +7%: +7% Insight bonus to Doubleshot chance.
Quality Doubleshot +3%: +3% Quality bonus to Doubleshot chance.
Doublestrike +23%: +23% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.
Insightful Doublestrike +11%: +11% Insight bonus to Doublestrike chance.
Quality Doublestrike +5%: +5% Quality bonus to Doublestrike chance.
DR 4/-: Reduces all physical damage by 4/-
Druidic Stoneshape: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to PRR equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.
Druidic Survival Mastery: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to damage equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.

Earthgrab Guard: This items stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer is hit in melee, this power will occasionally come to the surface calling on earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.
Elemental Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic resistance.
Competence Elemental Resistance +15: Passive: +15 Competence bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic resistance.
Inherent Elemental Resistance +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire resistance.
Electric Resistance +76: Passive: +76 Enhancement bonus to Electric resistance.
Superior Acid Resistance: +40 Enhancement bonus to resist Acid.
Cold Resistance: +50 Enhancement bonus to resist Cold.
Greater Lightning Resistance: +30 Enhancement bonus to resist Electric.
Superior Electric Resistance: +40 Enhancement bonus to resist Electric.
Superior Fire Resistance: +40 Enhancement bonus to resist Fire.
Superior Sonic Resistance: +40 Enhancement bonus to resist Sonic.
Light Absorption +30%: Passive 30% Enhancement Bonus to Light Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Acid Absorption +35%: Passive +35% Enhancement Bonus to Acid Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Cold Absorption +35%: Passive +35% Enhancement Bonus to Cold Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Electric Absorption - 20%: Passive 20% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Fire Absorption +10%: Passive 10% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Force Absorption +20%: Passive 20% Enhancement Bonus to Force Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Sonic Absorption +53%: Passive 53% Enhancement Bonus to Sonic Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Epic Captain's Set: When wearing both items from the Captain's Set, you gain a +2 Quality bonus to Strength
Epic The Devil's Handiwork: While wearing six items from The Devil's Handiwork you gain a +3 Quality bonus to all ability scores.

Feather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the decent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
Fortification +100%: Passive: +100% Enhancement Bonus to Fortification.
Insightful Fortification +92%: Passive: +92% Insight Bonus to Fortification.
Quality Fortification +38%: Passive: +38% Quality Bonus to Fortification.
Exceptional Fortification +50%: Passive: +50% Exceptional Bonus to Fortification.
Feat Mobility: While equipped, this item grants the feat Mobility.
Feeds Off Madness: This item greedily feeds off the aura of madness related to certain Xoriat effects. The more of these its wearer is affected by, the stronger this item will become.
Freedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under then influence of maic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.

Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to your incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Enhanced Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
Greater Boon of Undeath: Undead take solace in the hate of others. Every time you are struck in combat, an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell will be cast on you.

Greater Dispelling Guard: This item is infused with a power that purges out the magical energies of those that strike the wearer. When the wearer is hit in melee it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect on the attacker, stripping away its protective spells.

Greater Dispelling: This weapon is infused with a power that purges out the magical energies of those that it strikes. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect to the target, stripping away its protective spells.
Greater Heroism: Passive: +4 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.
Improved Heroism: Passive: +3 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.
Superior Heroism: Passive: +5 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.
Greater Marshwalker: This is one of the two pieces of the Greater Marshwalker set. When both items are equipped you receive +30% striding and a +15 competence bonus to your Jump skill.
Greater Regeneration: This item is imbued with an undeniable goodness that freely flows outward in a pleasant palpable current, constantly healing the wearer over time.
Greater Siren's Ward: When both items in this set are equipped you gain a +2 Insight bonus to your saves and a +4 Insight bonus to your AC.
Greater Vulkoor's Might: This is one of the two pieces of the the Greater Vulkoor's Might set. When both items are equipped you will receive +4 damage and 20% extra threat.

Greater Vulkoor's Cunning: This is one of the two pieces of the the Greater Vulkoor's Cunning set. When both items are equipped you will receive 20% less threat and deliver a powerful Vulkoorim poison on vorpal strikes.
Acid Guard X: When Hit in Melee: Deals 10d4 Acid damage to your attacker.
Lightning Guard VII: When Hit in Melee: Deals 7d4 Electric damage to your attacker.
Halcyon Mind: When you are damaged by an attack: 5% chance to gain 15 temporary Spell Points. These last for 1 minute or until they are used.
Hit Points +50: Passive: +50 Enhancement Bonus to Hit Points.
Incite +59%: +59% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generated from melee damage.
Quality Incite +44%: +44% Quality bonus to increased threat generated from melee damage.
Insightful Incite +27%: +27% Insight bonus to increased threat generated from melee damage.
Disease Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to disease effects.
Blindness Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to blindness effects.
Immunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
Immunity to Slippery Surfaces: The wearer of this item is not affected when walking on slippery surfaces.
Petrification Immunity: This item gives immunity to Petrification.

Improved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: Applies Quell to the target enemy for six seconds, rendering then unable to cast divine spells. 50% chance of peventing the target from casting all spells for 3 seconds (12 second cooldown).
Lesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
Magical Sheltering +52: This item provides a +52 Enhancement bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.
Insightful Magical Sheltering +24: This item provides a +24 Insight bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.
Quality Magical Sheltering +7: This item provides a +7 Quality bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.
Natural Armor Bonus +19: Natural Armor bonus to AC.
Healing Amplification +83: +83 Competence Bonus to your incoming Positive healing.
Insightful Healing Amplification +47: +47 Insight Bonus to your incoming Positive healing.
Quality Healing Amplification +24: +24 Quality Bonus to your incoming Positive healing.
Exceptional Healing Amplification +22: +22 Exceptional Bonus to your incoming Positive healing.
Equipped Healing Amplification +43: +43 Equipment Bonus to your incoming Positive healing.

Negative Healing Amplification +20: +20 Enhancement Bonus to your vulnerability to Negative spells or effects. This increases the amount by which you are healed from Negative Energy if you are Undead.

Insightful Negative Healing Amplification +43: +43 Insight Bonus to your vulnerability to Negative spells or effects. This increases the amount by which you are healed from Negative Energy if you are Undead.

Quality Negative Healing Amplification +22: +22 Quality Bonus to your vulnerability to Negative spells or effects. This increases the amount by which you are healed from Negative Energy if you are Undead.
Parrying +6: +6 Insight bonus to AC and saves.
Physical Sheltering +35: This item provides a +35 Enhancement bonus to your Physical Resistance Rating.
Insightful Physical Sheltering +24: This item provides a +24 Insight bonus to your Physical Resistance Rating.
Quality Physical Sheltering +11: This item provides a +11 Quality bonus to your Physical Resistance Rating.
Elemental Resonance +142: Passive: +142 Equipment bonus to Acid, Fire, Electric and Cold Spell Power.
Potency +145: Passive: +145 Equipment Bonus to Universal Spell Power.
Quality Potency +23: Passive: +23 Quality Bonus to Universal Spell Power.
Insightful Potency +10: Passive: +10 Insight Bonus to Universal Spell Power.
Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural disease and also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases.
Proof Against Poison +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons and also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons.
Protection +10: Passive: +10 Deflection Bonus to Armor Class.
Raging Focus: While Raged, +4 Rage Bonus to Saves vs. Enchantments.
Raging Resilience: While Raged, +4 Rage Bonus to Fortitude Saves
Reinforced Fists: This item surrounds your fists with kinetic energy. Your unarmed damage is boosted by one half die.
Repair Amplification +72: Amplifies incoming repairs by +72.
Insightful Repair Amplification +31: Amplifies incoming repairs by +31.
Repair Amplification +43: +43 Enhancement Bonus to Repair Amplification.
Remove Exhaustion: Removes any Exhaustion and Fatigue effects. (3 Uses)
Resistance +10: +10 Resistance bonus to all saves.
Insightful Resistance +8: +8 Insight bonus to all saves.
Quality Resistance +4: +4 Quality bonus to all saves.
Riposte: When its wearer is successfully attacked in melee, this item occasionally allows you to make an immediate counter attack, dealing bludgeoning damage to the offending enemy.
Riposte +9: +9 Insight bonus to AC and to saves.
Riposte VII: When missed by an attack: Deals 7 to 28 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to AC and a +3 Insight bonus to saves.
Riposte VIII: When missed by an attack: Deals 8 to 32 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to AC and a +4 Insight bonus to saves.
Roar: This item emits a frightening roar when melee attackers score a critical hit on the wearer, causing them to resist or be shaken with fear.
Fortitude Save +16: This item gives a +16 Resistance bonus to your Fortitude save.
Insightful Fortitude Save +2: This item gives a +2 Insight bonus to your Fortitude save.
Quality Fortitude Save +3: This item gives a +3 Quality bonus to your Fortitude save.
Reflex Save +1: This item gives a +1 Resistance bonus to your Reflex save.
Quality Reflex +3: This item gives a +3 Quality bonus to your Reflex save.
Insightful Reflex Save +4: This item gives a +4 Insight bonus to your Reflex save.
Will Save +16: This item gives a +16 Resistance bonus to your Will save.
Insightful Will Save +2: This item gives a +2 Insight bonus to your Will save.
Quality Will Save +3: This item gives a +3 Quality bonus to your Will save.
Seeker +17: Passive: +17 Enhancement Bonus to Critical Hit Damage and to rolls to confirm a critical hit. (Bonus critical hit damage is applied before weapon multipliers.)
Insightful Seeker +10: Passive: +10 Insight Bonus to Critical Hit Damage and to rolls to confirm a critical hit. (Bonus critical hit damage is applied before weapon multipliers.)
Quality Seeker 4: Passive: +4 Quality Bonus to Critical Hit Damage and to rolls to confirm a critical hit. (Bonus critical hit damage is applied before weapon multipliers.)
Exceptional Seeker +5: Passive: +5 Insight Bonus to Critical Hit Damage and to rolls to confirm a critical hit. (Bonus critical hit damage is applied before weapon multipliers.)
Sheltering +50: This item provides a +50 Enhancement bonus to your Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings.
Insightful Sheltering +5: This item provides a +5 Insight bonus to your Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings.
Quality Sheltering +7: This item provides a +7 Quality bonus to your Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings.
Skill +20: Passive: +20 Competence Bonus to the ? skill.
Dexterity Skills - Exceptional Bonus +2: Passive +2 Exceptional Bonus to Balance, hide, Move Silently, Open Lock and Tumble.
Strength Skills - Exceptional Bonus +1: Passive +1 Exceptional Bonus to Strength based skills.
Constitution Skills - Exceptional Bonus +2: Passive +2 Exceptional Bonus to Concentration.
Intelligence Skills - Exceptional Bonus +2: Passive +2 Exceptional Bonus to Disable Device, Repair, Search and Spell Craft.
Charisma Skills - Exceptional Bonus +2: Passive +1 Exceptional Bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, Intimidate, Perform and Use Magic Device.
Shatter +15: This effect gives a +15 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
Insightful Shatter +11: This effect gives a +11 Insight bonus to the DC to resist Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.

Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus t AC. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +6: Provides a +6 Insight modifier to attack bonus and a +9 Insight bonus to damage for any attack that would qualify as a sneak attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
Soundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout.

Effect.Immunity: Stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound based spells

EffectDescriptions.EffectDescription: Speed XV: +30% Enhancement bonus to Movement Speed and a +15% bonus to Attack Speed.
Speed +30%: This item increases your speed giving you a +30% Enhancement bonus to Movement Speed and a +15% bonus to Attack Speed.
Spell Focus V: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your ? spells.
Spell Focus Mastery +7: Passive: +7 Equipment bonus to the DC of all spells.
Profane Spell Focus II: You have a +2 Profane bonus to all Spell DCs.
Sacred Spell Focus II: You have a +2 Sacred bonus to all Spell DCs.
Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +4: Passive: +4 Insight bonus to the DC of all spells.
Quality Spell Focus Mastery +2: Passive: +2 Quality bonus to the DC of all spells.
Spell Lore VIII: +8 Equipment Bonus to all Spells chance to Critical Hit.
Insightful Spell Lore V: +5 Insight Bonus to all Spells chance to Critical Hit.

Superior Lightning Lore XII: +12% Equipment Bonus to Electric Spells chance to Critical Hit. Electrical spell critical damage is increased by adding 0.5 to the spell critical damage multiplier. this does not stack with other item effects or potions.
Spell Penetration III: Passive: +3 Equipment Bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
Spell Penetration +8: Passive: +8 Equipment Bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
Quality Spell Penetration +2: Passive: +2 Quality Bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
Insightful Spell Penetration +4: Passive: +4 Insight Bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
SpellPower +100: Passive: +100 Equipment Bonus to ? Spell Power.
Spell Resistance +30: +30 Enhancement bonus to spell resistance.
Insightful Spell Resistance +20: +20 Insight bonus to spell resistance.
Quality Spell Resistance +10: +10 Quality bonus to spell resistance.
Spiked: On Damage: 5% chance of dealing an addition 10d6 Pierce Damage.
Spike Guard: On Being Hit in Melee: 5% chance to do 100 to 500 Pierce Damage to the Attacker.
Spike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
Spiked: This weapon is studded with vicious spikes, causing it to deal piecing damage in addition to its normal damage types.

Staggering Blow: This item is enchanted to make your attacks send enemies reeling. When you roll a 20 on an attack with a melee weapon you will knock the target down unless it makes a DC 17 Balance check.
Stealth Strike 15%: Reduces the threat generated by ranged attacks and spells by 15%
Striding +30%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a +30% bonus to run speed.
Stone Prison Guard: This item has a chance to turn those who hit you to stone. A successful Fortitude DC17 save will negate this effect.

Stunning +22: If this effect is on a weapon, each attack that deals damage has a 3% chance to stun the target if it fails a DC 35 Fortitude Save. In addition this effect gives a +12 Enhancement bonus to the DC of your Stunning Blow/Fist abilities.
Insightful Stunning +11: +11 insight bonus to the DC of your Stunning Blow/Fist abilities.

Exceptional Stunning +12: If this effect is on a weapon, each attack that deals damage has a 3% chance to stun the target if it fails a DC 35 Fortitude Save. In addition this effect gives a +2 Enhancement bonus to the DC of your Stunning Blow/Fist abilities.

Swim like a Fish: While this item is equipped and you are swimming, you gain the Evasion feat. Evasion causes you to take no damage on a successful Reflex saving throw against an effect which would normally allow half damage on a successful Reflex save.
Tet-zik, The Enlightened Change: Whispers of the ancients grant you the ancient martial secrets of the Thri-Kreen. Your elemental monk stances grant additional bonuses.
Underwater Action: This item grants its wearer the ability to breathe water as if it were air.
Underwater Action +20: You have a +20 Competence bonus to Swim and can breathe underwater.
Vengeful Fury: On Taking Damage: Gain a 5% Insight Bonus to Doublestrike and a +4 Rage Bonus to your Attack Bonus.
Vertigo +15: +15 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist Trip and Improved Trip attempts.
Vitality +60: Passive: +60 Vitality bonus to Hit points.

Way of the Sun Soul: When all three items from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain a temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.

Wizardry +412: Passive: +412 Enhancement Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).

Quality Wizardry +77: Passive: +77 Quality Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).

Insightful Wizardry +206: Passive: +206 insight Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).

Insightful Wizardry +189: Passive: +189 Insight Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).
Wondrous Craftsmanship: This item's enchantments are more powerful than is normal for an item of this level. (+2 Total Enhancement Value)

Woodsman's Guile: This item is one of the three parts of the Woodsman's Guile set. When all three items are equipped you will gain a +4 bonus To-Hit and a +6 bonus to your damage for any attack considered a Sneak Attack.

Elemental Spell Power: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +50 bonus to your maximum spell points. this stacks with all other bonuses except Elemental Spell Power.

Greater Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +50 bonus to your maximum spell points. this stacks with all other bonuses except Greater Elemental Energy.

Legendary Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +150 bonus to your maximum spell points. this stacks with all other bonuses except Legendary Elemental Energy.
Profane Lifeforce +33: +33 Profane bonus to Hit Points.
Superior False Life: This item grants the wearer +40 maximum health.
Quality False Life +8: This item grants the wearer +8 quality bonus to maximum health.
Insightful False Life +40: This rare and powerful item grants you a +40 insightful bonus to your maximum hitpoints.
False Life +81: This item grants the wearer +81 enhancement bonus to maximum health.
Axeblock VII: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Bludgeoning or Piercing weapons.
Spearblock VII: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons.
Hammerblock VII: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Slashing or Piecring weapons.
Axeblock III: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 6, except from Bludgeoning or Piercing weapons. (Damage Reduction: 6/Pierce, Bludgeon)
Permanent Nihil: Passive: +30 Alchemical bonus to Negative Energy spell power.

Fire Shield(Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield(Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield(Hot) from another source, they will nullify each other.
Fire Shield (Cold): You permanently benefit from Fire Shield(Cold) which proects you from Fire Damage and harms those who attack you. You are permanently warded against Fire Shield(Hot)

Fire Shield(Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield(Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield(Cold) from another source, they will nullify each other.

Freezing Ice: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice)

Epic Freezing Ice: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice)
Spell Absorption: This effect absorbs harmful spells targeted at the wearer. (25 charges)
Spellcasting Implement +29: Passive: +29 implement bonus to Universal spell power.
Spell Focus II: Passive: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist all spells.

Invisibility Guard: This item has a chance of granting you temporary invisibility when you are hit bu foes. The invisibility will not be removed when you attack or take damage, but it will wear off after 10 seconds.

Nightmare Guard: This item has a chance of terrorizing foes that hit you, applying a Mind Thrust effect when you are hit by them (dealing 5 to 40 Force damage, Will vs. Enchantments negates). It may also expose your foes to their greatest fears, acting as a Phantasmal Killer spell.

Legendary Nightmare Guard: On being hit ot missed, this item has a chance to attempt to fear your enemy, ripping the life from them as if they were struck with a Phantasmal Killer spell. Enemies must make a DC 100 Will save versus Fear or a DC 100 Fortitude save versus Death or be slain. Even if they make their save versus Death, they may still be feared.

Persuasion: This item gives a +3 competency bonus to all Charisma based skills.
Greater Poison Guard: This item carries a potent venom that may be contracted by enemies that hit you, dealing 2 to 12 Strength damage. A successful Fortitude save (DC 28) negates this effect.

Eternal Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Eternal Faith items increase the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, their maximum Hit Dice turned by +2 and their total Hit Dice turned by +4.

Greater Thorn Guard: This item stings those that attack the wearer, causing 2d6 piercing damage on a successful melee attack.

Greater Raven's Eye: This is one of the two pieces of the Greater Raven's Eye set. When both items are equipped you will gain a +4 to-hit and a +3 stacking bonus to your Spot and Search skills.

On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit, the weapon severs an opponent's limb from its body. Some creatures, including many aberrations and all oozes, have no limbs. Most other creatures, however, have their movement slowed 75% and attacks slowed by 50% when a limb is cut off.

Radiant Blast: Tis weapon stores the power of the plane of Irian deep within. Occasionally, this dynamic power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive blast of radiant light.

Gashing 10: The edges of this weapon are sharpened beyond beleif, dealing an additional 10d6 slashing damage on each critical hit.

Bonesplitter: This weapon is powerful enough to shatter the bones of those it strikes. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit, the weapon breaks multiple bones in the target's body, causing significant impairment. Creatures with skeltons take 40d6 damage and will have their movement and attacks slowed by 25% and their attack damage reduced by 25% when their bones are shattered.

On a Vorpal strike that is confirmed as a critical hit, it releases a Shockwave that does tremendous Sonic damage to all foes. Furthermore, the enemy that the shockwave is released on is Dazed from the force of the blast.

Pierce Adamantine: Provides the Pierce Adamantine feat, allowing your equipped weapons to break Adamantine DR.

You will gain +1 Ki on every successful attack, and you will increase the number of Action Boosts, Turn Undead attempts, and Bard Songs you can use per rest by 1 each. These additional uses will only take effect after you rest.

The Dragging of the Depths: Attuned to the dark depths of the waves below, this weapon is cold to the touch and unholy. Each hit drains life from your enemies, dealing 9d6 Evil damage, and when striking Good enemies, it also deals an additional 9d6 Cold damage.

Nymph's Healing Empowerment: This soft and soothing magic empowers your ability to heal others. Your Empower Healing metamagic costs 3sp less to use.

Faeryfire Curse: Empowered by the Faerylights, your Illusion spells have a chance to curse your enemies with Purple Faery Fire, dispelling stealth, invisibility, blur, and displacement for 30 seconds, and giving a -40 penalty to hide. Sightless enemies are immune to the dazzle effect.
Illusory Death 3: Increases your caster level when casting illusion and necromancy spells by three.

Bloody Thorns: These boots are both surefooted and a dangerous weapon to those well-versed in Nature. You receive a Primal bonus to Damage for half of your Wilderness Lore feats.

Crystal: Rumor has it that the crystal this item is made from comes from Riedra and has certain qualities in common with crysteel. Crysteel weapons are able to overcome the protective damage reduction of many Quori creatures, which can be resistant to other weapons. Spell failure chances for armors and shields made from cystal are also decreased by 10%
Poison Resistance +81: Passive: +81 Enhancement bonus to Resist Poison.

Prolonged exposure will make the target more and more difficult to heal and repair, cutting their Healing and Repair Amplification, and also interferes with their ability to use magic by occasionally Quelling enemies on a Vorpal strike.

Alchemical Earth Attunement: Attacks and offensive spells deal stacking acid damage over time.

For the next ten seconds, this will grant a +4 Alchmical bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity, as well as a 5% Alchemical bonus to your chance to doublestrike and a +2 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class.

First Litany of the Crimson Covenant: Bleed

EffectDescriptions.EffectDescription: Second Litany of the Crimson Covenant: "Seek the divine within, for the blood is the life...". On Hit: You are healed for 4d2 hit points.

Third Litany of the Crimson Covenant: "...and in its call can be heard the promise of eternal life." On Hit: Strip the vitality from your enemies, dealing 5 Constitution damage and reducing their Physical and Magical Resistance ratings by 10.

Effect.DisplayName: Third Litany of the Crimson Covenant: Con Dmg
Third Litany of the Crimson Covenant: Con Dmg

EffectDescriptions.EffectDescription: Final Litany of the Crimson Covenant: "One has but to listen." On Hit: This dagger has a chance of conjuring the Mark os Death itself, snuffing the life from your foes and slaying them instantly without a save.
Mind Tear: This weapon tears at the identity of your foes, reducing their MRR and Spell Power.
Kick 'Em While They're Down: You have 5 more attack and deal 5 more damage to enemies that are knocked down or stunned.

Quenched: Your Cold and Lightning spells apply the debuff portion of Quench with no save. Your enemies receive a -20 penalty to cold and electricity resistance. The resistance bonuses and penalties increase to 25 at caster level 8, and 35 and caster level 12. They last one minute. Fiery enemies, such as fire elementals, take 27 to 33 cold damage per 4 caster levels, to a maximum of 108 to 132.
Insightful Power of the Frozen Storm +109: +109 Insightful Bonus to Cold and Electric Spell Power.
Quality Power of the Frozen Storm +54: +54 Quality Bonus to Cold and Electric Spell Power.
Inspriration of the Inferno: While this Fiddle is equipped, you will use it to perform your Bardic Music.
Bone Paws: While in any Wild Shape, your weapons gain Piercing damage bypass and +1[W]

Rune Arm Imbue Tidal Shot VI: Wearing this Rune Arm will imbue any weapon you wield, dealing 2 to 20 points of untyped damage per hit. Fire creatures take double damage. This damage scales with 200% Melee or Ranged power (whichever is higher)

Effect.DisplayName: Rune Arm Imbue Tidal Shot VI
Rune Arm Imbue Tidal Shot VI

EffectDescriptions.EffectDescription: Sight Beyond Sight: You can see through all veils, piercing magical and mundane defenses alike. +5% Enhancement bonus to Dodge Bypass.
Eversight: You benefit from the spell True Seeing and are Immune to Blindness.
Titania's Warmth: The Queen of Summer sends her regards... Attacks and offensive spells have a chance to grant 1000 temporary hitpoints. This has a one minute cooldown.
Purifying Flame Lore +32%: Passive: Your Fire and Light spells gain a +32% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Power of the Flames of Purity +219: Passive: +219 Equipment bonus to Fire and Light Spell Power.
Summer's Impertenence: The heat of Summer surrounds you. +20% Enhancement bonus to critical damage with Fire and Light spells
Dripping with Magma: This Obsidian weapon drips with magma on every swing. Your attacks have a high chance to deal very strong fire damage over time.

Flamebitten: On Hit: Applies a stack of Vulnerable (1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) This effect may only occur on-hit once every two seconds. On Vorpal: Appies a stack of Ashscarred (-1 to all Saving Throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.)
Frostblade: This blade is made of pure ice and is surprisingly light to the touch. It bypasses Incorpreal changes of Ethereal monsters innately.
Royalty's Frigid Response: The Prince of Frost sends his regards... Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to freeze an enemy in a block of ice.
Icy Blast 6: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, dealing 6d6 Cold damage n a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Cold damage on a critical hit.
Flameblade: This blade is made of pure fire and is surprisingly light to the touch. It bypasses Incorpreal changes of Ethereal monsters innately.
Overwhelming Incineration: This weapon stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. Occasionally, this destructive power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with overwhelming fire damage.

Shielded by Moonlight: Being struck in melee has a small chance to return some lost Hitpoints and Spellpoints to you. Offensive spells have a chance to grant 100 temporary spellpoints. This has a one minute cooldown.
Moonlit Haunt Lore +32%: Passive: Your Negative, Force and Poison spells gain a +32% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Shadowblade: This blade is made os pure force and is surprisingly light to the touch. It bypasses the Incorporeal chances of Ethereal monsters innately.
Force Blast 4: This weapon ripples with intense force, dealing 4d6 Force damage on a successful hit, and an additional 4d6 Force damage on a critical hit.
Constricting Nightmare: Enemies struck by this weapon are striken with a horrible fear of death, reducing their Physical Resistance and Magical Resistance by 10.
Sonic Spell Crit Damage: +20% Enhancement bonus to critical damage with sonic spells.
Spell Turmoil: When casting any damaging Fire, Cold, Acid or Electric spells, there is a chance that you will gain a +20 Alchemical bonus to Spell Power to one of those energy types for 30 seconds.
Fusible: Something about this item looks incomplete. Perhaps in the future it will be compatible with another item to create a brand-new fusion of the two.
Malleable: This item has a magical aura of malleability and can be combined with any item that has the Fusible property to create a new, more powerful fusion of the two items.

Inflict Blight: This weapon is infested with the unholy and blighted power of the earth. Rarely, this power will come to the surface, attempting to melt enemies struck with Acid, Negative, Poison, or Evil spells by dealing significant Acid damage over time.
Animal Bane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to disrupt the natural, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Animals

Accursed Flame: Coalesce beyond the material, join us in the Flame! Hatred burns eternal! This weapon is wrapped in cursed flames, dealing an additional 6d6 Fire damage on each hit. When striking an enemy that has been Quelled, it also deals 6d6 Evil damage each hit. This effect makes the weapon evil aligned. Good character wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.
Rune Arm Focus +6: +6 Equipment bonus to DC of Rune Arms
Superior Stability: This armor grants a +6 defelection bonus to AC and a +6 resistance bonus to saves for characters of True Neutral alignment.
Lesser Turning: This will increase the total number of Turn Undead attempts you can use by 2. However, these additional Turn Undead attempts will only take effect after the wielder rests.
Greater Turning: This will increase the total number of Turn Undead attempts you can use by 4. However, these additional Turn Undead attempts will only take effect after the wielder rests.
Greater Undead Guard: This item burns those Undead that attack the wearer, causing 5 to 40 Good damage on a successful melee attack.

Trap the Soul Guard: This tem stores an overwhelming merciless power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, suckin gout the life force of an enemy and imprisoning the essence of their body and soul in a gem.

Legendary Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heat of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is struck in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, causing a tremendous amount of Fire damage to the attacker.

Legendary Ice Shards Guard: This item stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, dealing an incredible amount of Cold damage to the attacker.

Legendary Lightningstorm Guard: This item stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, striking the attacker with an incredible amount of electrical force.

The Golden Curse: A strange inscription winds around this artifact. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked, occasionally an incredible power comes to the surface, shielding its wielder in solid gold to protect them from further attacks.

Greater Electric Storm: This weapon is imbued with an electrifying wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this shocking power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 30d3 + 90 electric damage. A successful Reflex save (DC 90) reduces this by half.

Legendary Electric Storm: This weapon is imbued with an electrifying wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this shocking power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 30d6 + 90 electric damage.

Acidic Reaping: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies grants you 40 Acid resistance for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
Displacement: You gain Displacement as a SLA, 3 charagter, caster level 25
Reptilian Bane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those with cunning and scales, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Reptilians.

Evil Blast 6: This weapon is a sinister implement of evil deeds, dealing 6d6 Evil damage on a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Evil damage on a critical hit. This effect makes the weapon evil aligned. Good characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.
Frozen Depths Lore +21%: Your Negative, Poison, and Cold spells gain a 21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Power of the Frozen Depths +146: +146 Equipment bonus to Negative, Cold, and Poison Spell Power.

Holy Burst 6: This weapon sings of virtue, dealing 6d6 Good damage on a successful hit to Evil enemies, and 14d6 Good damage on a critical hit to Evil enemies. This makes the weapon good aligned. Evil characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.
Poison Blast 6: This weapon drips with a vile poison, dealing 6d6 poison damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 6d6 poison damage.

Legendary Entangling Yarn: Enemies struck by this weapon have a small chance to be tangled up in its enchanted yarn, becoming Entangled and preventing all movement for 9 seconds. A DC 110 Reflex Save negates this effect.
Legendary Slowburst: A critical hit with this weapon, the target is Slowed for 30 seconds. A DC 100 Will save negates.

Legendary Paralyzing: Any creature struck by this weapon must succeed on a DC 100 Fortitude save or be paralyzed. The target may attempt a new save to end the effect every several seconds; otherwise the paralysis lasts for 1 minute.

Legendary Virulent Poison: This item carries a potent venom that is delivered with your attacks. On any strike, the Poison has a chance to be applied, dealing 5d6 Constitution damage if your enemy fails a DC100 Fortitude saving throw.
Bless Ward: You are warded against the Bless spell.
Bane of the Depths: Your Negative, Cold, and Poison Spells automatically apply the effects of Bane to enemies struck.
Feeding 30: On Vorpal Hit: Your target incures one Negative Level, and you gain +30 Temporary Hit Points. (These Temporary Hit Points last for one minute, or until used to negate incoming damage.)

Lifedrinker: This weapon uses the power of water to draw out the life essence of its targets. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit, this power comes to the surface, granting 25 Temporary hitpoints to the wielder and dealing 25 to 45 damage to the target. Creatures with the Fire trait take double the damage instead.
Mortal Strike: On an attack role of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this weapon triggers the Slay Living spell and attempts to instantly snuff out the life force of the enemny.
Legendary Brilliance Guard: This item is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, the attacker has a chance of becoming blinded.

Nullmagic Guard: On being hit with a spell: There is a small chance that you explode in arcane energies. Foes hit are subject to a silencing effect, preventing their spellcasts and dampening their magical protections for 10 seconds.

Legendary Stone Guard: This item is invested with the power of the earth. On being struck in melee, it has a chance to attempt to turn the target to stone, as the Flesh to Stone spell. A successful Fortitude save (DC 100) negates the effect.

Legendary Trap the Soul: This equipment stores an overwhelming, merciless power deep within. When you stirke an enemy with a melee or missile attack, this power occasionally comes to the surface, sucking out the life force of an enemy and imprisoning the essence of their body and soul in a gem.
Major Lesser Dragonmark Enhancement: This will increase the total number of Lesser Dragonmarks you can use by 5. However these only take effect after resting.
Greater Dragonmark Enhancement: This will increase the total number of Greater Dragonmarks you can use. However these only take effect after resting.
Crushing Despair: You get Crushing Despair as a SPA. 5 Charges, Caster level 30

Axiomatic Blast 4: This weapon is an implement of law, dealing 4d6 Law damage on a successful hit, and an additional 4d6 Law damage on a critical hit. This effect makes the weapon lawfully aligned. Chaotic characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.

Anarchic Blast 4: This weapon is a chaotic conduit, dealing 4d6 Chaos damage on a successful hit, and an additional 4d6 Chaos damage on a critical hit. This effect makes the weapon chaotically aligned. Lawful characters wielding this weapon suffer one negative level.
Thunderstorm Lore +16%: Passive: Your Sonic and Lightning spells gain a +16% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Power of the Thunderstorm +111: Passive: +111 Equipment bonus to Sonic and Electric Spellpower.
Moonlit Haunt Lore +23%: Your Negative, Force, and Poison spells gain a +23% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Power of the Moonlit Haunt +157: Passive: +157 Equipment bonus to Negative, Force, and Poison Spell Power.

Chimera's Vitality: This item grants extra bonuses if the wearer has been bestowed with Dragonmarks. You gain +1 Uses of Greater Dragonmark and +5 Quality Physical Resistance Rating per Dragonmark you have.
Dragonmark of Sentiel bonus: You gain the effects of the Deific Warding feat. This does not stack with the feat itself.
Turning +3: This will increase the total number of Turn Undead attempts you can use by 3. However, these additional Turn Undead attempts will only take effect after the wielder rests.
Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you 30 temporary hit points.

Sovereign Lightning Strike: This item crackles with power, flickers of lightning emanating from it. On a strike of a Natural 20 that is confirmed as a critical hit, this item will strike your foe with a tremendous burst of lightning. A DC 100 Reflex save will prevent half of this damage.
Keen: Passive: The base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with the Improved Critical feat. Vorpal strikes by this weapon also bypass all Fortification.
Impact: Passive: The base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with the improved critical feat. Vorpal strikes by this weapon also bypass all Fortification.
Legendary Telekinetic: On hit, this has a chance of knocking your enemies off their feet. Stuck enemies must make a DC 100 Reflex save or be knocked down.

Legendary Cursespewing: On a natural 20 attack roll, this weapon lashes out with a vengeful curse that confers a -4 morale penalty on attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks. This agonizing curse also causes the victim to take 6d6+6 damage every two seconds for a duration of twelve seconds. Additional vorpal strikes while the curse is still active will extend the duration by another twelve seconds.
Soundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout.

Brilliance of the Shattered Sun: Light drips from within this small container, sparkling before your eyes. With this item equipped, your offensive attacks and spells have a chance of creating a burst of pure light, dealing Light damage and blinding enemies.
Soul Tear: This weapon tears at the soul of our foes, reducing their PRR and Healing Amplification.

Unholy Burst 6: This weapon is a sinister implement of evil deeds, dealing 6d6 Evil damage on a successful hit to Good enemies, and 14d6 Evil damage on a critical hit to Good enemies. This makes the weapon evil aligned. Good characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negative level.

The Falling Star: On hit, this weapon has a chance to pull down a falling star upon your foes, dealing 90d6 Fire Damage and 30d6 Bludgeoning Damage to enemies caught within the blast. The blast is so powerful it has a chance to knock nearby enemies down upon impact.

Thrill of the Hunt: "Lesser beings hunt for the prize, but for me, the hunt itself is prize enough". On Hit: You have a small chance to attempt to hold a monster in place. Even if the Hold is unsuccessful, their Will saves will be reduced by 5.
Feat: Elusive Target: Passive: You gain the feat Elusive Target.
Sacred Ground Lore +22%: Passive: Your Acid, Light, and Alignment spells gan a +22% Equipment Bonus to their chance to critical hit.
Power of the Sacred Ground +148: Passive: +148 Equipment bonus to Acid, Light, and Alignment Spell Power.
Plant Bane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to disrupt Plants, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Plants.
Legendary Slay Living: On hit, this has a chance of snuffing the life from your foes, slaying them instantly. Struck enemies must make a DC 100 Fortititude save or be slain.

Everbright: Flecks of marble and pearl shimmer across this shield, set within images of bursting stars and beaming suns. An everbright shield will never take damage from rust or acid and can emit a Blinding Flash 3/rest.
Feather Fall: Spell Like Ability. 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
Stabbing 15: The edges of this weapon are serrated, dealing an additional 15d6 piercing damage on each critical hit.
Embodiment of Law: Chaotic aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.

Chaotic Outsider Bane 6: This weapon is designed specifically to hunt the unnatural that does not belong, dealing an additional 6d6 bane damage vs. Chaotic Outsiders. This makes the weapon Lawfully aligned. Chaotic characters wielding this weapon will suffer one negativee level.
Negative Blast 6: This weapon is an unholy conduit, dealing 6d6 Negative damage on a successful hit, and an additional 6d6 Negative damage on a critical hit.
Human Bane 6: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those with diversity and ambition, dealing an additional 6d10 bane damage vs. Humans.
Dark Restoration Lore +23: Passive: Your Negative, Poison and Positive spells gain a 23% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
Power of the Dark Restoration +155: Passive: +155 Equipment bonus to Negative, Poison and Positive Spell Power.

Utter Disintegration Guard: This item has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies that strike you and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.

Legendary Virulent Poison Guard: This item carries a potent venom that is delivered when enemies strike you. When an enemy strikes you, the poison has a chance to be applied, dealing 5d6 Constitution damage if your enemy fails a DC100 Fortitude saving throw.

Legendary Air Guard: This weapon stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the user of this weapon is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.
Extra Lay on Hands +3: You have +3 Lay on Hands charges.

Sound and Silence: When true power is spoken, weaker beings cannot refute it. Your offensive spells and attacks have a small chance to cause 10d20 Sonic Damage to nearby enemies and Silence them. Each target can negate the Silence on Will save vs DC 90.

Sun Burst: This weapon flashes an intense burst of sunlight on any critical hit. The target is blasted for 6 to 36 of light damage and is blinded as well. Oozes and Undead take 12 to 72 light damage. A successful DC 22 Reflex save reduces the damage by half and negates the blindness.

Greater Disease Guard: This item carries the Virulent Maggot Plague disease, which deals 2 to 12 Constitution damage and may be contracted by enemies that hit you. A successful Fortitude save (DC 28) will negate the effect.
Rune Arm Charge Rate 30%: This Rune Arm has a 30% Enhancement bonus to its Charge Rate.
Planar Searing: This weapon harbors a burn unlike anything you've ever seen - As if otherworldly power has started to change it forever.
Greater Marksmanship: This item is enchanted to enhance your skill with ranged weapons. You gain a +3 Competence Bonus to Ranged Attack and a +2 Competence Bonus to Ranged Damage.
Legendary Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +240 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.

Legendary Disease Guard: This item carries the Maggot Plague disease, which deals 3d6 Constitution damage and may be contracted by enemies that hit you. A successful Fortitude Save (DC 100) will negate this effect.
Sight Beyond Sight: You can see through all veils, piercing magical and mundane defenses alike. +5% Enhancement bonus to Dodge bypass.
